channel.title: Main class
channel.description:
Rookie Help For most package's that I download, I appear to have the same error occurring. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/8whxf8.png[/img] The source itself runs fine however, the client doesn't. It compiles and everything, just won't let me run the client. Does any one know what's happening or experienced this error before? I have searched on google for known problems and fixes but none really seem to fix the error I hjave Would it be because I am running Windows 8? The code inside the batch file:
@echo off title mast3r-pkyz 525 Client cd src java -Xmx1024m client 1 live live software members english game1 exit
All help appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Main class
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

There is no error… It just can’t simply find the client class. If you’re using two different clients with two different directories to the class files, the run.bat file will be different. The one goes into the src folder and the other one does’t. For the one with the src folder, you will need to add: cd ./src/ In the run.bat (Assuming that’s where the class files are).

Read full topic

item.title: Main class
item.dc:creator: @hazlloyd hazlloyd
item.description:
@hazlloyd wrote:

Surely the error code is the same for the two clients?

Read full topic

item.title: Main class
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

What the hell? You’re posting two different clients, make up your mind.

Read full topic

item.title: Main class
item.dc:creator: @hazlloyd hazlloyd
item.description:
@hazlloyd wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Are your class or java files in the src folder?

In my folder directory I don’t have a ‘src’ folder in my client folder.

676pdt.png1366×768

If it helps, which I don’t think it will, there is one in the source.

Read full topic

Rookie Help

For most package’s that I download, I appear to have the same error occurring.

8whxf8.png837×468

The source itself runs fine however, the client doesn’t.
It compiles and everything, just won’t let me run the client.

Does any one know what’s happening or experienced this error before?
I have searched on google for known problems and fixes but none really seem to fix the error I hjave
Would it be because I am running Windows 8?
